title: U.S. consumers ' purchase frequency of cosmetic products 2014
summary: This chart shows the Share of respondents made by Response in a purchase frequency .
\\n From the chart we see that the Hair_styling_products Response was the U.S. consumers Response in the frequency with 87 respondents .
The next Response to make the most respondents was the Sunscreen Response with 41 respondents closely followed by the None_of_these Response with 8 respondents .

data.Response: Facial/skin care products (e.g. moisturizers primers specialty cleansers)
Non-sunscreen products with SPF protection (e.g. lotions lip balm)

gold: This statistic presents the results of a survey among U.S. adult consumers . The survey was fielded online by Harris Interactive in June 2014 , asking the respondents which cosmetic products they purchase and regularly use . Some 42 percent of U.S. adults indicated that they purchase and use hair styling products on a regular basis .
